kv16.7:1.5: nanu anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:1.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.7:2.1: ☑ Alobho kusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:2.3: Rūpaṃ kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:3.7: paññā kusalā sārammaṇā, atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:3.9: Rūpaṃ kusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:4.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ kusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:4.3: Alobho kusalo anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:5.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ kusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:5.4: paññā kusalā anārammaṇā, natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:6.5: nanu anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:6.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.7:7.1: ☑ Lobho akusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:7.3: Rūpaṃ akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:7.8: anottappaṃ akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:7.10: Rūpaṃ akusalaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:8.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ akusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:8.3: Lobho akusalo anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:8.5: rūpaṃ akusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:8.9: anottappaṃ akusalaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.7:9.6: Hañci kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ kusalampi akusalampi, tena vata re vattabbe—
